title: Wearable Technology-Based Technical Subject MOOC: Practice-Oriented Learning Design to Improve Completion Rates

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational programming and hardware manipulation experience
context.additional_context: Learners perform practice tasks linked to real-time biometric feedback using personal wearable devices (smartwatches/bands or mobile alternatives).

learning_goals: Learners can analyze biometric data collected from wearable technology to visualize learning motivation patterns
Learners can complete 80% or more of personalized practical assignments through an LMS system integrated with wearable devices
Learners can evaluate peers' wearable data utilization cases through peer review and propose three improvement strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
